name: SelectOption

constuctors.name: SelectOption
constuctors.description: Creates a new instance of the SelectOption class using the specified value and label.

constuctors.name: SelectOption
constuctors.signature: public SelectOption(String value, String label, Boolean isDisabled)
constuctors.description: Creates a new instance of the SelectOption class using the specified value, label, and disabled setting.

methods.name: getDisabled
methods.description: Returns the current value of the SelectOption object's isDisabled attribute.

methods.name: getEscapeItem
methods.description: Returns the current value of the SelectOption object's itemEscaped attribute.

methods.name: getLabel
methods.description: Returns the option label that is displayed to the user.

methods.name: getValue
methods.description: Returns the option value that is returned to the controller if a user selects the option.

methods.name: setDisabled
methods.description: Sets the value of the SelectOption object's isDisabled attribute.

methods.name: setEscapeItem
methods.description: Sets the value of the SelectOption object's itemEscaped attribute.

methods.name: setLabel
methods.description: Sets the value of the option label that is displayed to the user.

methods.name: setValue
methods.description: Sets the value of the option value that is returned to the controller if a user selects the option.

description: A SelectOption object specifies one of the possible values for a Visualforce selectCheckboxes, selectList, or selectRadio component.
